quote: The biggest issue with money is we don’t understand how it works, so no matter how much we make, we can’t seem to get to the place called financial freedom
author: Arese Ugwu

quote: People should not just look at people who are on top. They should go and study how they got there and the challenges they had to face while climbing the ladder
author: Folorunsho Alakija

quote: Your gifts keep improving when you feed it and take risks. Push further to a bigger goal.
author: TY Bello

quote: The greatest thing you can do for yourself in every time you have the opportunity to handle someone’s project, knock it out the park, and that is what I live by every day
author: Kemi Adetiba

quote: A woman becoming financially independent doesn’t equate to ‘I don’t need a man’. It just means, she brings more to the table. Instead of being a financial burden, she becomes a value addition
author: Arese Ugwu

quote: I try not to focus on the negatives and limitation. I just work hard and make sure I deliver with the opportunity given to me.
author: Kemi Adetiba

quote: I believe that when you find problems, you should also find solutions
author: Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala

quote: Confidence comes from being prepared, and preparation comes from careful planning
author: Nimi Akinkugbe

quote: If people look inward, they would see the opportunities for greatness
author: Aliko Dangote

quote: Wherever you are, there is always someone trying to get there. Mentor someone.
author: Tara Durotoye

quote: In whatever you do, strive to be the best at it
author: Aliko Dangote

quote: Everything in life succeeds where opportunities meet preparation.
author: Tunde Folawiyo

quote: When you do a good job, when you help others, when you tell them that no is not the answer, success follows
author: Stella Okoli

quote: Leadership is first among among equals. It goes with humility.
author: Tony Elumelu

quote: What I always say is that money doesn’t have colour. It doesn’t matter whether you are from Africa or anywhere in the world. The colour of money is the same
author: Aliko Dangote

quote: Never allow the perception of others to play a substantial part in your own vision of yourself and your future.
author: Jim Ovia

quote: Therefore, whatever course you choose to take in the services of others, be guided by the goal of unleashing the inherent potential that resides in each and every one of us
author: Tony Elumelu

quote: eople who succeed in life are those who are willing to work harder than everybody else
author: Segun Agbaje

quote: ou must have joy in whatever you are doing, because what’s in this life?
author: Pascal Dozie

quote: It takes hard work, diligence, determination and more to get through the process of turning your passion into an enterprise
author: Florence Chikezie

quote: Honesty and integrity are keys. Always honour contracts. It’s very important to be of tremendous integrity. Those who try to take shortcuts will always fail.
author: Jim Ovia

quote: When you are psychologically defeated, you lose the war
author: Leo Stan Ekeh

quote: Your daily activities should be geared towards developing your passion.
author: Florence Chikezie

quote: Don’t rely solely on your job for your income; Be creative, you can generate extra cash.
author: Nimi Akinkugbe

quote: If you want to become Steve Jobs … take it one step at a time.
author: Tony Elumelu

quote: Persevere – Never give up! Today’s world enjoys electricity because of those who did not give up!
author: Folorunsho Alakija

quote: Don’t give up when things get tough, just hang in there, stay focused and be patient
author: Folorunsho Alakija

quote: Helping others is helping myself.
author: Anie Akpe

quote: In my dictionary, ‘can’t’ doesn’t exist.
author: Kemi Adetiba

quote: Sometimes you have to tune out others so that you can tune into your internal voice
author: Anie Akpe

quote: Discover your passion and what you love doing as you may find that this is what drives you most towards success; it might also help you to employ others
author: Nimi Akinkugbe

quote: In leadership, no knowledge gained is lost
author: Tony Elumelu

quote: Rome was definitely not built in a day. Take your time, learn so that you can grow that empire.
author: Anie Akpe

quote: A person’s ability to attract wealth is tightly linked to how well they are able to grow and leverage their network to take advantage of opportunities.
author: Arese Ugwu

quote: Impossibility only happens in the brain
author: Tony Elumelu

quote: Don’t be afraid of failure as long as you are doing everything within your power to succeed. The challenges we face in life are always lessons that serve as our personal growth
author: Arese Ugwu

quote: Push worry, anxiety and society back and learn to live
author: TY Bello

quote: Leadership is a journey and it occurs at every stage
author: Tony Elumelu

quote: Its best to see what others are doing and adjust your vision as needed. Be flexible to changes and be open to partnerships
author: Anie Akpe

quote: No one can do it for you, you have to do it yourself
author: Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala

quote: I love transformation. I love to see someone go from nothing to something
author: TY Bello
